meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a pyrometric tool to measure the extreme heat of the fire.
meanings.sent2: The pyrometric equipment helped in accurately gauging the intense heat of the furnace.
meanings.sent3: The pyrometric thermometer was so precise that it could even measure the heat of a dragon's breath.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for pyrometric experiments burned as brightly as the hottest flames.
meanings.sent5: The pyrometric scale painted a vivid picture of the scorching temperatures in the volcano.

meanings.definition: A device used to measure high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The pyrometric was essential in determining the temperature of the molten metal.
meanings.sent2: He carefully calibrated the pyrometric before using it to check the heat of the engine.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat mistook the pyrometric for a toy and played with it in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The pyrometric hummed with precision as it analyzed the scalding heat of the steam.
meanings.sent5: The old pyrometric had witnessed countless blazing temperatures over the years.
